SlurmdPort=6818

StateSaveLocation=/var/spool/slurmctld
SwitchType=switch/none
#TaskPlugin=task/none
TaskPlugin=task/affinity,task/cgroup

# TIMERS
#KillWait=30
#MinJobAge=300
#SlurmctldTimeout=120
#SlurmdTimeout=300

# LOGGING AND ACCOUNTING
